questions.question: The maximum energy that can be stored safely in a capacitor is limited by

answers.d: both breakdown voltage and width of dielectric

questions.question: The dielectric used in high value capacitors is
A capacitor with the following text on its body: 105K has a capacitance of
Which of the following best describes the time constant in an RC (resistor - capacitor) circuit?

answers.a: Time for the charge stored in the capacitor to drop to 37% of its original value.
answers.b: Time for 37% of the initial charge to leave the capacitor.
answers.c: Time for the capacitor to completely discharge.
